home_intro_title: We take care of your garden, choose us!
home_intro_description: Bioagri was born from the idea of ​​a young entrepreneur, as a local reality with the aim of combining passion and dedication for agronomy by putting them at the service of the community
home_section_order_description: Products and services for agriculture, gardening and animal care.
home_promo_sales_title: Save up to 30% on our entire collection!
home_promo_categories_title: Find the one that's right for you!
home_promo_food_motto: Make yourself comfortable, we'll take care of the shopping!
foo_header_connected: Follow us on our social networks to stay connected!
foo_body_description: BioAgri S.r.l.s. is a company that operates in the agricultural sector by distributing and providing consulting services and products for gardening, cultivation, and tools for agronomy.
about_header: Find out more about our history!
about_presentation_title: Let us tell you our story
about_presentation_body: Ours is a family-run company founded in 1983, has always been active in the agricultural sector, and has expanded over the years to have customers throughout the region. From 2017 after several generations the company has passed into the hands of Salvatore Crisafulli, a very young entrepreneur who, against the crisis facing the Calabrian territory, has undertaken the difficult decision to invest in his passion
about_history_1_event: Bio Agri saw the light in 1983 on an August morning, by the hand of Vincenzo Crisafulli, who wants to transform his passion for agriculture into a job.
about_history_2_event: Then sees the regional authorization in 1989 after a great commitment, the first physical store of BioAgri is born.
about_history_3_event: Decisive year in which the company begins to provide, in addition to agricultural material, also personalized consultancy, for all agricultural services.
about_history_4_event: For the first time, BioAgri products are sold on the web through the Ebay platform, where the service is still active today.
about_history_5_event: After 34 years Vincenzo Crisafulli leaves the company in the hands of his son Salvatore.
support_header: Find out how to get in touch with us!

payment_pickup_instruction: For many products, free and easy collection is available directly in our office. You can then make your online purchase and conveniently collect the products at our office. If you choose this method, you can also contact us directly for after-sales services (returns, warranty, etc ...) for maximum comfort!
payment_pickup_disclaimer: By confirming the user accepts the Terms of Service, the Privacy Policy, and undertakes to go to the office to confirm the order.
